title.rendered: Creating Images for Amazon via UGC Part I with Daisi Pollard Sepulveda of My Product Model

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 41:59 — 38.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 41:59 — 38.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Daisi is a “Modelpreneur” – former Miss Jamaica, Founder of My product Model.com which is an agency for eCommerce entrepreneurs to get incredible photography; also the founder of “Brazen Influencers”, an agency that links eCommerce sellers and influencers.

What You’ll Learn

  • How to understand User Generated Content
  • What is UGC
  • How do you use UGC?
  • You can use UGC in so many ways!
  • How to encourage UGC
  • What makes a good UGC image?
  • Using UGC in your ad creatives

Resources Here

  • UGC Guide and Course
  • Use the Promo Code : AMAZINGFBA20 for a Discounted Price for MyProductModel
